{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR2249 |revision= |upc=738168033904 |ean= |asin=B00006H33F |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/30/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2422AP-0T |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O7J-GL2422AP |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.3 |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2422T4 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=USR2249 |default_ssid_regex=^USR2249$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:49 |oui_eth=00:C0:49 |default_ch= }} ''U.S.Robotics 22Mbps Wireless Access Point''
{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=2249}} The device is accessible at 192.168.1.1 when the emergency flash recovery mode has been activated. The included power supply is a '''Fairway Electronic''' WN10A-050 (5V, 2A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:USRobotics_USR2249_board_top_card_in.jpg|board top, card in File:USRobotics_USR2249_board_top_card_out.jpg|board top, card out File:USRobotics_USR2249_board_bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
